definitions.definition: To cry ; to shed tears , especially when accompanied with sobbing or other difficulty speaking, as an expression of emotion such as sadness or joy.
To give off moisture in small quantities, e.g. due to condensation .

subdefinitions.label_groups: medicine , of a wound or sore

subdefinitions.definition: To flow in drops; to run in drops.

definitions.definition: To hang the branches, as if in sorrow; to be pendent ; to droop; said of a plant or its branches.

main_definition: To cry ; to shed tears , especially when accompanied with sobbing or other difficulty speaking, as an expression of emotion such as sadness or joy.
secondary_definitions: To give off moisture in small quantities, e.g. due to condensation .
To hang the branches, as if in sorrow; to be pendent ; to droop; said of a plant or its branches.
( obsolete , transitive ) To weep over; to bewail.
